code: import{key,baseUrl}from'../utils';export var FETCH_MOVIES_PENDING='FETCH_MOVIES_PENDING';export var FETCH_MOVIES_SUCCESS='FETCH_MOVIES_SUCCESS';export var FETCH_MOVIES_ERROR='FETCH_MOVIES_ERROR';function fetchMoviesPending(){return{type:FETCH_MOVIES_PENDING};}function fetchMoviesSuccess(movies){return{type:FETCH_MOVIES_SUCCESS,movies:movies};}function fetchMoviesError(error){return{type:FETCH_MOVIES_ERROR,error:error};}export function fetchMovies(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchMoviesPending());fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/movie/popular?api_key=").concat(key,"&language=en-US&page=35")).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){if(res.error){throw res.error;}dispatch(fetchMoviesSuccess(res));return res;}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchMoviesError(error));});};}
